website_summaries.verdict: This is a reliable stick for an entry-level player with the type of durability that would be expected for the price.
pros: The sidewall design allows it to be a fairly lightweight yet durable stick
The flexible scoop allows for easy ground ball pickup, and the handle has good grip
cons: While it's durable enough for most high school players, you could get more out of more expensive sticks

customer_reviews.title: great stick
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old daughter is in the Lacrosse team and she LOVES this stick. Not only does it look really nice in person (not one of those plastic-y flimsy ones sold in big box stores and sporting good stores) but it plays well, too. It's also stood up to quite a bit of beating (being tossed over a fence, for instance...) in addition to regular play. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C.M. & T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice but, unfortunately my child decided after the return policy expired that she didnt want to play lacrosse. So we have a bunch of lacrosse equipment for my little soccer player. I'm going to make her carry the stick and wear the goggles pads for soccer. They said you cant use your hands they said nothing about sticks.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Coach approved
customer_reviews.text: This stick with the 6000 handle is so much easier to use and pick up ground balls than their generic STX stick that we picked up in a box store. Definitely get this one!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good stick but...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her stick works great. We did have a string break after a month seems like it should be stronger from talking to a lacrosse store they say this is a problem on the 300 model the strings are very weak.... I would think a company in business for this long making this type of product would know better .
customer_reviews.author: pike513

customer_reviews.title: I coach girls lacrosse and always coach with a women's ...
customer_reviews.text: I coach girls lacrosse and always coach with a women's stick. The strings at the bottom of the pocket tend to loosen and slide which could cause a ball to go through. I'm probably going to have to re-string the head. Other than that a solid stick.
customer_reviews.author: CadetFB2000

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stick for a beginner. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! I am amazed at how far my daughter has come in learning to use it. Realize it's not all the stick, but it has been perfect stick for her, just starting out. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A good looking piece
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality stuck. I bought it for my daughter and it's been a great stick so far. She's used it about a month now. She says it fits well its quality, great weight. Looks nice too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Brown of Heber

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for good price
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's first year playing lacrosse. So far, so good. The colors are bright and she really likes it. It is regulation for her girls her age (16). She did have to re string the net to tighten it but i think that is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: 10 & 11 years old) love this stick
customer_reviews.text: My girls (9,10 & 11 years old) love this stick.
customer_reviews.author: Frye’s

customer_reviews.title: She's getting ready to start high school and plans on taking up lacrosse so I thought this would be a great beginner's stick
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister. She's getting ready to start high school and plans on taking up lacrosse so I thought this would be a great beginner's stick. She loves it. We're outside every weekend practicing. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Keonte Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this stick and the plastic cap at the end of the stick came missing. Would not recommend. I needed it for a practice in a few days and now that it came broken I have to find a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Sanal

customer_reviews.title: Great stick, great colors
customer_reviews.text: All you could ask for in a lacrosse stick at this price. Excellent, especially for new players.
customer_reviews.author: Vaska Bourdina

customer_reviews.title: Love this stick
customer_reviews.text: Love this stick. Great design love the colors was delivered on time as promised will definitely be ordering from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter who plays lacrosse thought it was a little heavier than her other sticks. Good quality. She'll adjust!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Raymond

customer_reviews.title: great stick
customer_reviews.text: Great stick, really flexible head, easy for my girl to scoop, really a pretty stick
customer_reviews.author: DSH-A08

customer_reviews.title: but seems sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight, but seems sturdy and well made. Nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: mmc

customer_reviews.title: she loves it
customer_reviews.text: I can pick her out on the field before I can even see her face. It matches her bright personality!
customer_reviews.author: b herr

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Have a beginner players, seems to work well. Cheaper then getting an old basket restrung!
customer_reviews.author: kktoy722

customer_reviews.title: A Great BEGINNERS Stick
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought me this stick last year and it was great until my eighth grade term. Balls start coming harder and faster. It's great for beginners, though.
customer_reviews.author: BIG D

product_meta.title: STX Lacrosse Crux 100 Girls Complete Stick
product_meta.description: The newly redesigned STX crux 100 Women's complete stick is the attacker's choice for precision shooting. The crux 100 features an aggressive sidewall design that reduces weight yet remains strong as well as the STX precision pocket for a no-fuss and accurate pocket.
feature_bullets: Sidewall design reduces weight without sacrificing strength
Flexible scoop for easy ground ball pickup
